name: gameshq-api
description: Headquarters of all the things XTeam games

scripts.dev: npm install --frozen-lockfile --production=false && npm run build && npm run prepare-db && concurrently "tsc --watch" nodemon
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run test:all
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run test:all:coverage
scripts.test:integration: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run test:_integration
scripts.test:integration:single: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run test:prepare:integration && npm run mocha
scripts.test:unit: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run mocha "test/**/!(*integration).test.ts"
scripts.test:unit:single: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run mocha
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && rsync -av --exclude='*.ts' src/ dist/src
scripts.build:start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build:start:noseed: npm run build && npm run start:noseed
scripts.//2: * Rest of those commands are used internally and should not be used directly!
scripts.prepare-db: echo preparing db for nodeenv: $NODE_ENV env: $ENV && npm run db:seed:up && npm run db:migrate:up
scripts.db:test:clear: docker-compose -p gameshq-api-test-project -f 'docker-compose-test.yml' down && docker volume rm gameshq-api-test-project_postgres
scripts.test:all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names *typescript,*****eslint,*tests:unit,integration --prefix-colors blue.inverse,blue,yellow,green 'npm run tsc' 'npm run eslint' 'npm run test:unit' 'npm run test:integration'
scripts.test:all:coverage: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names *typescript,*****eslint,**tests:all, --prefix-colors blue.inverse,blue,yellow 'npm run tsc' 'npm run eslint' 'npm run test:_all:coverage'
scripts.test:prepare:integration: npm run db:test:create &&  cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run prepare-db
scripts.test:_integration: npm run test:prepare:integration && npm run mocha "test/**/*.integration.test.ts"
scripts.test:_all:coverage: npm run test:prepare:integration && npm run mocha:coverage "test/**/*.test.ts"

author: X-Team Community
